snippet: The Department of Veterans Affairs, recognizing the problem, has started a series of hiring fairs.
abstract: Government and veterans groups that are working to bring down the high unemployment rate for recent veterans are finding it a major problem to translate the work of war to peacetime jobs; Dept of Veteran Affairs, in effort to address issue, is starting series of hiring fairs.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Veterans Affairs, recognizing the problem, has started a series of hiring fairs.

headline.main: Agency Confronts Hurdles in Helping Veterans Match Military Skills to Civilian Jobs
headline.print_headline: Agency Confronts Hurdles in Helping Veterans Match Military Skills to Civilian Jobs

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
